title: Bug 23433[Dialogs] ContainerSelectionDialog changes meaning of initialRoot parameter
description: Bug 23433[Dialogs] ContainerSelectionDialog changes meaning of initialRoot parameter ContainerSelectionDialog's constuctor has a parameter 'initialRoot' along withassociated JavaDoc which suggests that the parameter will be used for the rootcontainer. In fact, this parameter is used as the selection andContainerSelectionGroup always uses the root of the workspace.Furthermore, the JavaDoc alludes to another nonexistant constructor inContainerSelectionDialog.
